# System Settings

  • Preset
    • Swap and choose your saved lobby settings
  • Black Screen Prevention (Recommended)
    • ON: Mod will prevent black-screening
    • OFF: Mod will not prevent black-screening

  • Enable Gradient Tags (can cause disconnect issues)

    • ON: Gradient Tags can be used.
    • OFF: Gradient Tags cannot be used.
  • Enable use of /kcount command
    • ON: Players can use /kcount to see the amount of killers left
    • OFF: Players cannot use /kcount to see the amount of killers left
  • See ejected roles in meetings
    • ON: Roles of ejected players will be shown to everyone
    • OFF: Roles of ejected players will not be shown to everyone

  • Kick players whose level is lower than

    • Set the minimum level required to play
      • Temp Ban low level players
        • ON: Temporarily bans low level players from your lobby
        • OFF: Doesn't temporarily ban low level players from your lobby, kicks them like usual

  • Turn on Whitelist to bypass level kick

    • ON: Whitelisted players can join the lobby even if they don't meet lobby requirements
    • OFF: Whitelisted players are ignored, and treated as everyone else is

  • Kick Non-PC players

    • ON: Non-PC players cannot play
      • Kick Android players
        • ON: Android players will be kicked from the lobby automatically
        • OFF: Android players will not be kicked from the lobby automatically
      • Kick iOS players
        • ON: iOS players will be kicked from the lobby automatically
        • OFF: iOS players will not be kicked from the lobby automatically
      • Kick Xbox players
        • ON: Xbox players will be kicked from the lobby automatically
        • OFF: Xbox players will not be kicked from the lobby automatically
      • Kick PlayStation players
        • ON: PlayStation players will be kicked from the lobby automatically
        • OFF: PlayStation players will not be kicked from the lobby automatically
      • Kick Nintendo Switch players
        • ON: Nintendo Switch players will be kicked from the lobby automatically
        • OFF: Nintendo Switch players will not be kicked from the lobby automatically
    • OFF: Non-PC players can play

  • Kick players without a friend code

    • ON: Players without a registered account cannot play
    • OFF: Players without a registered account can play
      • Temp Ban players without a friend code
        • ON: Temporarily bans players without friend codes from your lobby
        • OFF: Doesn't temporarily ban players without friend codes from your lobby, kicks them like usual

  • Apply VIP List

    • ON: Players who are VIPs will be given a VIP Tag in the lobby
    • OFF: There will be no VIP Tag in the lobby

  • Apply DenyName List

    • ON: Players using names in the DenyName.txt document cannot play
    • OFF: All names are allowed to play

  • Apply BanList

    • ON: Players that have been banned in previous lobbies cannot join new lobbies by the host
    • OFF: Players that have been banned in previous lobbies can rejoin new lobbies by the host

  • Apply Moderator List

    • ON: Players that have been added to the Hosts Moderator List will be given Moderator Permissions in the lobby
    • OFF: Players that have been added to the Hosts Moderator List will not be given Moderator Permissions in the lobby
      • Allow moderators to use /say command
        • ON: Moderators can use /say to send a message when dead
        • OFF: Moderators cannot use /say to send a message when dead

  • Kick players that say start

    • ON: Players that type start, Start, begin, etc will be kicked from the lobby
      • Number of warnings before kick
        • Set how many times a player can say start before they get kicked
      • Block a player after theyre kicked
        • ON: Players that get kicked from spamming Start will be auto-blocked
        • OFF: Players can join even when kicked
    • OFF: Players will be able to say start, Start, begin, etc without being kicked

  • Temp ban players who keep quitting

    • ON: Players that keep quitting will be blacklisted from joining for some time
    • OFF: Players that keep quitting will not be blacklisted from joining for some time
      • Amount of Quits needed for temp ban
        • Set how many times a player can say quit before they get temp banned

  • Minutes to wait before auto-starting

    • Set how many minutes the host has to wait before the game auto-starts

  • Force start when Lobby Timer (in minutes) goes below

    • Set the time when the game will auto-start

  • Minimum Player Threshold to auto-start

    • Set the minimum amount of players required to auto-start the game

  • Initial countdown for auto-starting

    • Set the countdown for auto-starting the game

  • Auto Play Again

    • ON: The game will auto-start again after the game ends
    • OFF: The game will not auto-start again after the game ends
      • Delay before re-entering lobby
        • Set how long it will take to re-enter lobby after a round
  • Low Load Mode
    • ON: Mod will use less power for loading things, making it run a bit faster
    • OFF: Mod will use its default power for loading things, making it run a bit slower
  • End the game when a player has a critical error
    • ON: Game will force end once a player gets a game breaking bug
    • OFF: Game will continue as before

  • When a cheating player is found

    • You can choose an action to take when a player is found cheating
      • Ban - Adds them to the BanList.txt immediately
      • Kick - Kicks them from the lobby
      • Notify Me - Notify only the host of the cheating player
      • Notify Everyone - Notify everyone of the cheating player

  • Display Kill-log

    • ON: Kill-log of the previous round will be displayed once people enter the lobby
    • OFF: Kill-log will not automatically be displayed. (People can still /l)

  • Display Last Roles

    • ON: Everyone's roles of the previous round will be displayed once people enter the lobby
    • OFF: Roles will not automatically be displayed. (People can still /l)

  • Auto Display Last Result

    • ON: Last Results of the previous round will be displayed once people enter the lobby
    • OFF: Last Results will not automatically be displayed. (People can still /l)

  • Suffix

    • Change the Suffix under Host name
    • You can choose between:
      • None - Displays nothing
      • Version - Displays which TOHE update the lobby is using
      • Streaming - Displays that you are Live-Streaming
      • Recording - Displays that you are Recording
      • Room Host - Displays that you are the Host of the Room
      • Original Name - Displays your Among Us Display Name
      • Dont kill me - Displays the words Dont kill me below your name
      • No phones - Displays No phones below your name
      • Auto-Host - Displays Auto-Host below your name

  • Hide Game Settings

    • ON: Others won't see what roles are enabled/disabled
    • OFF: Others can see what roles are enabled/disabled like usual

  • Players can use the /color command

    • ON: players can /color to change their Bean Color
    • OFF: players cannot change it with the command and have to do it normally

  • Player Name Mode

    • This is how the players name is displayed in game. You can choose between:
      • Disable - Default player names will be used
      • Color - Display the players color
      • Random - Display a random name

  • Disable Emoji in names

    • ON: players cannot use emoji in their names
    • OFF: players can use emoji in their names

  • Show Role Info to Unmodded Clients Round 1

    • ON: Info about each User's role is sent to them Round 1
    • OFF: Users have to manually type /m to check their role info

  • Show Role Descriptions to Unmodded Clients at First Meeting

    • ON: descriptions about each User's role is sent to them on the First Meeting
    • OFF: Users have to manually type /m to check their role description
  • No Game End
    • ON: the game cannot end until the host ends it
    • OFF: the game can end normally
  • BepInEx Console
    • ON: the console stays open during Hosting
    • OFF: the console minimizes during Hosting

  • Role Assigning Algorithm

    • These just change how roles are randomly assigned. You can choose between:
      • Default
      • .NET System Random
      • HashRandom
      • Xorshiftopen in new window
      • MersenneTwisteropen in new window
  • Camouflage Appearance
    • Set the appearance of how Camouflage looks when communications are sabotaged
      • Default - Everyone appears grey
      • Host - Everyone appears as the host's skin
      • KARPED1EM - Everyone appears as KARPED1EM's skin (the original creator of the mod)
      • Lauryn - Everyone appears as Lauryn's skin (the project leads girlfriend)
      • Moe - Everyone appears as Moe's skin (the project lead)
      • Pyro - Everyone appears as Pyro's skin (the Website Assistant)
      • ryuk - Everyone appears as ryuk's skin (a lead contributor)
      • Gurge44 - Everyone appears as Gurge44's skin (a lead contributor/TOHE+ Dev)
      • TommyXL - Everyone appears as TommyXL's skin (a lead contributor)
  • Enable Youtuber Plan
    • ON: Host can use the command /up [rolename] to get the specified role on the next game - Requires Permissions
    • OFF: Host cannot use the command /up [rolename] to get the specified role on the next game

From: TOHE
